channel.title: Where oh where?
channel.description:
where can i change what im wielding as starter armour ?
and i have a no-ip IP. and if somebody type that in that field. he cant join my server. and i portforwarded the good port.
somebody help me plzz. i get never answer

item.title: Where oh where?
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

In client.java search;

hitDiff = 30

Change to something like

hitDiff = 3 + misc.random(30);

Or something like that.

Read full topic

item.title: Where oh where?
item.dc:creator: @Loopget83 Loopget83
item.description:
@Loopget83 wrote:

Open Up Your Player.java,The Search Giving The Player,Right Below That You Will See This

	//Giving the player an unique look
	playerEquipment[playerHat]=2581;
	playerEquipment[playerCape]=1052;
	playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=1725;
	playerEquipment[playerChest]=14540;
	playerEquipment[playerShield]=3842;
	playerEquipment[playerLegs]=14541;
	playerEquipment[playerHands]=775;
	playerEquipment[playerFeet]=2579;
	playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1;
	playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1;
	playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4151;

Just Change The Id’s To The Ones You Want

Read full topic

item.title: Where oh where?
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

1.Player.java, search this;

// Giving the player an unique look

Underneath you’ll see something like this;

playerEquipment[playerHat] = -1; playerEquipment[playerCape] = -1; playerEquipment[playerAmulet] = 1725; playerEquipment[playerChest] = -1; playerEquipment[playerShield] = -1; playerEquipment[playerLegs] = -1; playerEquipment[playerHands] = 7462; playerEquipment[playerFeet] = 3105; playerEquipment[playerRing] = -1; playerEquipment[playerArrows] = -1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = 1323;

-1 Means there is no item equipped when you start.
Put the item ID in the corresponding field. =D
2.Portforward properly.

Hope i helped

Read full topic
